title: 【PSG複仇者】賓艾化： PSG習慣被反cup

replies.msg:
"We did a remontada. But they are used to it ": For Hatem Ben Arfa, revenge is a dish that is eaten cold
By winning the Coupe de France against PSG, Hatem Ben Arfa took revenge for two seasons that had marked him in the champion of France. And he absolutely did not lose his old club.

He could no longer restrain himself. The emotion was far too strong. Tears flowed. "I never usually cry," said Ben Arfa after the Rennes win in the Coupe de France. There, it was too strong. Before, when I watched the Olympic Games and saw athletes crying, I did not understand. But here I understand. The emotion rises and you can not do anything. "

https://www.francefootball.fr/news/On-a-fait-une-remontada-mais-ils-ont-l-habitude-pour-hatem-ben-arfa-la-vengeance-est-un-plat-qui-se-mange-froid/1013528

"One day, Adrien Rabiot will come back with a team and he will hurt them. It's life. We must respect the human being. Respect for the human is what is most important. " Before a final salvo. "It was really the big PSG, and we made a remontada. But they are used to it. " Clinic.
呢條友根本係天資好高，可惜痴痴地線
